home.home_greeting: HELLO! Welcome to my digital space
home.home_description: I'm a passionate and creative Web Developer based in Medellin, Colombia
home.home_contact: Contact me so we can discuss your needs and goals.

about.about_description: Transforming lines of code into memorable digital experiences is my motivation, my goal, and my profession. My previous experience in the world of technology, combined with my current expertise in web development, has allowed me to work on a variety of exciting projects that you can explore here.
about.about_desciption1: Full Stack Developer with expertise in front-end technologies such as React, Redux, HTML5, CSS3+, and Tailwind. In the world of back-end development, I have a strong skill set in Node.js, JavaScript, and PosgresSQL.
about.about_desciption2: International business professional with expertise in foreign trade, procurement, and supply chain management.

project1.name: WANDERLUST
project1.description: This project connects users based on their profile with travel packages and tourist activities around the world, comments and reviews or sales data, registered users, offered packages, or editing existing ones.

project2.name: VIDEOGAMES
project2.description: An application that aimed to connect an external API https://api.rawg.io/api/games so that different video games can be rendered, paginated, filtered, and searched, as well as create their own games by adding them to our database in Postgres.
